content.rendered:
Directed by Jinu Abraham.

Written by Jinu Abraham.

Cast Prithviraj Sukumaran(Adam Joan Pothen). Narain(Cyriac). Rahul Madhav(Alan Pothen). Bhavana(Swetha). Mishti(Amy Adam Joan). Lena(Daisy) .Melanie Beiler. Benny Bereal(Satanic Priest Michael). Christopher John Bridgett(Professor Edward). Danny Darren(David William). Pamela Hanson(Police Constable). Grant Manson McGregor(Satanic Priest John). Jaya Menon(Nirmala). Wendy j Morris(University Student). Maniyanpilla Raju(Andrew). Lintu Rony(Church attendee). Angel Shijoy(Mishti (voice)). Mark Strange(Dr. Steve). Begonia Villalba(Police Detective). Gerard Wilkie(Satanist). Paul Ellard(Police Officer (uncredited)). Paul Lapsley(Police Officer (uncredited)). James Sutherland(Driver / Paramedic / Security Guard / Kidnapper (uncredited))

Language Malayalam.

Producers Shashi Dubey. Umesh Unnikrishnan Nair.

Production Renji Panicker Entertainment.
